moves.1. e4: I started with e4 which I always play
moves.1... e5 2. Nf3 Nc6 3. Bb5: Ruy Lopez also known a Spanish Defence.
moves.15... Ncb4: Ncb4? the strongest move would be Re8. Rook somewhere and then Re5 defending the Knight.
moves.16... Ra1 17. cxb4 Rxb1 18. Bxd5 Bg5: I wasn't worried about that but then I saw the killer blow.
moves.19... Qxf7 20. Re8#: Nice mate by the Rook and that cheered me up because I lost my membership on Queenalice. Good Game.
